actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the marketing of saccharin under section 409 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Suspends for two years with regard to regulations involving saccharin the operation of the proviso in the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act which prohibits regulatory approval of a food additive found to cause cancer.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the marketing of saccharin under section 409 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
